item.title: Charges announced in gambling probe tied to NBA player, coaches

item.title: WATCH: Millions of crabs migrate across Christmas Island
item.description: Tens of millions of red crabs are making their annual migration to the ocean on Australia's Christmas Island.

item.title: WATCH: Russian drone strikes apartment building in Ukraine
item.description: Eyewitness footage captured the moment a Russian drone struck near an apartment building in Sumy, Ukraine, on Tuesday.
